importantArticles.headline: Occidental Petroleum (NYSE: OXY) is a major player in the energy sector and is one of the United States' top oil and gas producers.  After a banner year in 2022, Occidental strengthened its balance sheet and reduced its debt.  Occidental is perhaps best known as one of Warren Buffett's largest holdings in his Berkshire Hathaway portfolio.
